issue.title: [C++] arrow::PrettyPrint for Column instances
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3107](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3107). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, we support `arrow::ChunkedArray` instances in `PrettyPrint`. We should also support columns. The main addition will be here that will also print the specified field.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3107?focusedCommentId=16782811) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
This was resolved in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2857
